name: Fruity Jelly
description:
Touch Arcade ★ ★ ★ ★ 4/5

★«Fruity Jelly is an incredibly smart puzzle game with a crafty mechanic that will break your brain on more than a few occasions.» ★

App Shack: 9/10

★«The level design is top notch, and the gameplay is super smooth, and entertaining.” ★

ReviewT: A

★«Must-Have award!» ★


JELLY WAITING FOR YOU!

Meet Jelly, in an adventure to save his village destroyed by a mysterious creature! Gather all the fruits to revive your friends.

Tilt and rotate your environment and prepare for an awesome journey through dozens of fun and varied levels!

But be aware, on your way, you'll meet crazy foes, cute foes, mighty ones and a bunch of tricky traps!

Awareness is our priority for you, the player. We want you to enjoy this game as much as we enjoyed developing it.

Thanks for your support… and let's roll!


• Universal application for iPhone and iPad
• 60 levels and more to come!
• Tons of secretes and mysteries...will you find all the stars?
• 2 ways to play, accelerometer or touch? You choose!
• Regular updates with new levels and new features
• New checkpoints to give you a more enjoyable adventure.
• New worlds to explore and new gameplay features!
